Wordpress Resources

Below are themes and plugins that I have tested and found to be useful.

Themes

  • Primer - A solid, minimalist theme.
  • Floral Lite - A simple magazine or blog theme.
  • Shapely - A theme with more features (that requires more time to learn). Note: not all Shapely features play well with the Page Builder plugin below.

Plugins

  • WP Google Maps - Easily add customizable Google Maps to your site.
  • Page Builder by SiteOrigin - Create flexible page layouts. Note: does not work well with some other plugins.
  • MasterSlider - An easy-to-use image slider.
  • Disable Comments - Easily disable and hide comments.
